content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: MIDSDTC
      operator: exists
    - name: MIDS
      operator: not_exists
Core:
  Id: CORE-000193
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when variable MIDSDTC is present and MIDS variable is
  missing.
Outcome:
  Message: MIDS variable is missing when MIDSDTC variable is present in a dataset.
  Output Variables:
    - MIDSDTC
    - MIDS
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0503
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The start date/time of the Disease Milestone Instance
                  Name in MIDS.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: MIDSDTC
                Section: Timing
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when variable MIDSDTC is present and MIDS variable is missing.

Outcome.Message: MIDS variable is missing when MIDSDTC variable is present in a dataset.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The start date/time of the Disease Milestone Instance Name in MIDS.
